rules_text:
Catalyze {2}{R} [i](As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile this card from your graveyard and pay its catalyze cost. If you do, add this card’s effects to that spell.)[/i]
Electrotranscranial Blast deals 1 damage to any target. Exile a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the amount of damage this spell dealt. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
